response.headline: AWS CCAPI MCP Server: Natural Language Infrastructure Management Tool
response.summary: AWS announced the Cloud Control API (CCAPI) MCP Server, a new tool designed to simplify infrastructure management by enabling developers and AI-powered agents to manage AWS resources using natural language commands.
